testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) Copy the content of the testsuite's zip-file's folder 'test-audio' into the music directory (should be: 'unknown') on the phone. (The exact name of the destination folder may vary on your device.) 3) Ensure the volume is set to high, so you can hear the audio playing! 4) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Multimedia isAudioPlaying true in widget file test audio loop wav
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Multimedia isAudioPlaying true on device file virtual music test audio loop wav
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isAudioPlaying false
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isAudioPlaying true after a while in widget file test audio song mp3
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isAudioPlaying true after a while on device file virtual music test audio song mp3
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isAudioPlaying false when paused in widget file test audio song mp3
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

isAudioPlaying false when paused on device file virtual music test audio song mp3
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

mp3 song in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

mp3 song on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

mp3 loop very small file in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

mp3 loop very small file on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

wav song in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

wav song on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

wav loop very small file in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

wav loop very small file on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

streaming MP3 mp3 128k
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' to play audio. 2) Please be patient, it might take a while, depending on your network, etc.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

redirected streaming MP3 mp3 128k
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' to play audio. 2) Please be patient, it might take a while, depending on your network, etc.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

streaming OGG ogg vorbis q4
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' to play audio. 2) Please be patient, it might take a while, depending on your network, etc.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

redirected streaming OGG ogg vorbis q4
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' to play audio. 2) Please be patient, it might take a while, depending on your network, etc.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

open play 1sec stop in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio for a second.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

open play 1sec stop on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio for a second.
Expected behaviour: Did you hear any playback?

pause in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio for a second.
Expected behaviour: Did the playback stop after about 1 second?

pause on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio for a second.
Expected behaviour: Did the playback stop after about 1 second?

pause and play again in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio stop and play again?

pause and play again on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio stop and play again?

play loop in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio looping twice.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio play the same piece twice?

play loop on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio looping twice.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio play the same piece twice?

play loop in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio looping five times.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio play the same piece five times (5x)?

play loop on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio looping five times.
Expected behaviour: Did the audio play the same piece five times (5x)?

play resume in widget file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio, pause and hear it continue.
Expected behaviour: Did it pause for about 2secs and continue from where it had stopped?

play resume on device file
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio, pause and hear it continue.
Expected behaviour: Did it pause for about 2secs and continue from where it had stopped?

play Play MP3 file from device virtual music test audio song mp3
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have copied the audio files in to the devices music folder. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Do you hear the audio play?

play Play WAV file from device virtual music test audio song wav
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have copied the audio files in to the devices music folder. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Do you hear the audio play?

Check if Widget MultiMedia stopAll stops audio playing
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play audio.
Expected behaviour: Did it stop after about 2sec?

Verify the volume value
Instructions: 1) Change the volume of the phone to very loud! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown volume level correct?

Verify a different volume value again
Instructions: 1) Change the volumne of the phone to very low! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown volume level correct?

Verify the volume value 100 10
Instructions: 1) Change the volume of the phone to the loudest possible! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Verify the volume value 0
Instructions: 1) Change the volume of the phone to the lowest possible value! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Change volume while song is playing
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Turn down the volume. 3) Turn down the volume back up.
Expected behaviour: Had you been able to turn down the volume and back up?
